sentences.en: Dedally didst thou perform the tragic pasquinade.
sentences.cn: 你表演着悲情的讽刺文。

sentences.en: I thought the whole tale would shortly be served up in racy pasquinade.
sentences.cn: 我认为整个故事不久就会被添油加醋在黄色小报登出来.

sentences.en: To ridicule with a pasquinade; satirize or lampoon.

trans.tran_en: an abusive lampoon or satire, esp one posted in a public place
